subject: RE: [junit] Using JUnit with Kawa
msgSnippet: Dan, Which version of Kawa are you running?  I m still running 3.51a I tried version 4.0, but thought it was a step backwards in many places. - George
messageBody:
Dan,

Which version of Kawa are you running? I'm still running 3.51a
I tried version 4.0, but thought it was a step backwards in
many places.

- George

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Dan MacKay [mailto:dmackay@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, February 14, 2001 1:26 PM
> To: junit@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: RE: [junit] Using JUnit with Kawa
>
>
> Hi Eric,
>
> Thanks for the reply. Junit is launching fine. When I go run any
> of my test
> cases or suites from JUnit when it is launched from inside Kawa it cannot
> find the test class files.
>
> Dan MacKay
